Text:
Thanks Bone! They just released version 1.0.3 today, any chance you guys will be able to release the new update with free shopping?

You guys are appreciated!
I just installed this version, it runs fine but the free shopping didnt work for me, still charges me for everything. Anything particular I have to do, to get it working?
Nevermind, I see now! The silver/gold/spirit/swords are all free when uc lick the buy buttons. That's nice. Thanks guys!! sorry for other commment
